participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and artistic, loves to share experiences with friends.
participant_1.background: I would love to have lunch with a friend who shares my love of healthy food and music. I play drums in a band. I collect comic books. I used to be more spontaneous with my painting. I talk very fast.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Friendly and creative, enjoys family time and exploring artistic pursuits.
participant_2.background: My family works to support my dreams. I got married when I was young. I have been on the tv news six times. My favorite food is raw onion. My name is Mary.

content.text: Hi, what's your name?
Hi, my name is Mary.
It's nice to meet you, Mary. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Cool, what kind of bands do you like?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles.
Me too! They're my favorite band.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to paint, read, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to paint too.
That's awesome! What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits.
Those are both great subjects to paint! I'm not very good at painting, but I love to do it.
I'm sure you're better than you think!
Thanks! I'm not sure about that, but I'm glad you think so.
Well, I'm sure we could have a lot of fun painting together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to paint with you.
Great! We can set it up sometime.
Sounds good!
